text: Louisiana's 6th congressional district is a congressional district in the U.S. state of Louisiana. It is located in south-central Louisiana. The district has most of the state capital of Baton Rouge, its suburbs, and parts of Thibodaux. It also includes the western shores of Lake Pontchartrain. The district is currently represented by Democrat Cleo Fields. ==References== Category:Politics of Louisiana Category:Congressional districts of Louisiana
title: Louisiana's 6th congressional district
